channel.title: Posts on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on A Hugo website

item.title: Did the new faceoff rule change lacrosse?
item.description: library(tidyverse) library(gt) library(ggrepel) library(ggalt) The 2021 college lacrosse season got flipped upside down when a new face off rule was introduced. For decades people spent hundreds and thousands of dollars on lessons and personal trainers to perfect a specific face off move. Mostly every face-off guy in the game used the “pinch and pop”. To describe this move the player would start on one knee and have his hands in a motorcycle grip on the stick.

item.title: Who would have been in the 2020 D1 men's lacrosse final four?
item.description: On March 12th, 2020, the NCAA dropped the hammer on the 2020 lacrosse season. While most teams were midway through their season, the question of who would have made it to the Final Four. The Final Four games would have been played on the Lincoln Financial Field in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, but Coronavirus had other plans. Most people watching would have an educated guess that the ACC powerhouses Syracuse and The University of North Carolina would have been two of the four teams.

item.title: practice blog post
item.description: I am going to find the worst college football games from the 2019 season in terms of score differential and put them into a plot with all the games. library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.0 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.3 ✓ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✓ tibble 3.0.5 ✓ dplyr 1.0.3 ## ✓ tidyr 1.1.2 ✓ stringr 1.4.0 ## ✓ readr 1.4.0 ✓ forcats 0.5.1 ## ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() library(ggalt) ## Registered S3 methods overwritten by 'ggalt': ## method from ## grid.
